tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
At the outset I would like to state that for the great doctor as Dr.Sanjida Yasmin there are actually no words to write a review and rather as a couple we would like to take this opportunity to extend our gratitude towards her for being the most dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that she is! She always goes above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. We as a couple feel so blessed to know her and have her as our doctor.”

We have heard so much around pregnancy around us that we were afraid if we will be able to manage that, more specifically when we are not from Delhi and could find Dr.  Sanjida only through Practo and trust us one would not find a gynae as good as her. Initially I was in consultation with some other doctor but there I could not feel the comfort that I required as a first time “Mommy to be” but when it comes to Dr. Sanjida the only thing that strikes my mind is that she makes your pregnancy journey so soothing and comforting with her always positive attitude and inspirational words that even the toughest issues seem solvable. The pregnancy experience which she gave me indeed have a lifelong impact on me as I could not have imagined my entire pregnancy journey to be as smooth as she not only said she will make but also made it a reality till my delivery and even thereafter.

We were too keen to have a normal delivery but was not aware if that could be possible in my case. I remember Dr. Sanjida’s words amply clear that the only thing I need to do is keep my will power strong and stay motivated to have a normal delivery and rest leave it to her and I did exactly that and finally on 07.10.2022 I had a normal delivery and delivered a healthy Baby Boy.  My child is indeed very fortunate to have been born through Dr. Sanjida’s hands. We thank her for all the support and care throughout 9 months and even till now in my postpartum journey. 
She is outrightly one of most modest person I have known despite being so successful. I love the way she handles all your issues whether medical or financial. One can literally ask her all their queries and she would certainly clarify each of such query without any hesitation. As a doctor I believe the kind words and considerate approach towards issues also solves a lot of problems of the patient and Dr. Sanjida Yasmin has so much patience and literally listens to every word of her patient and I can never thank her enough for her continued undivided attention. 
Out of countless good things about the doctor some of the most prominent ones that I would like to mention are as;
	Thorough Knowledge about her field with immense experience that will loudly speaks for itself which one will be able to judge at the very first time you will meet her. 
	24/7 availability for all your issues 
	Calm, composed and positive attitude towards all problems
	Outstanding motivation and guidance in labour room 
	Extremely focused and dedicated 
	Encourages queries that the expecting parents might have
	Straightforward with patient regarding the issues and challenges but in such a kind and considerate manner to keep the patient comforted and motivated.
	Takes care of even the minutest thing from room allotment to staff selection during delivery, financial schemes/offers for expecting mothers from the hospital and even the small events like baby shower organized by hospital for expecting mothers and all these undoubtedly gives one an overall memorable experience 

Literally I can keep writing for hours when it comes to Dr. Sanjida. There are very few people in life who have such high and positive impact on your life and mine has been blessed to have an outstanding experience with Dr. Sanjida Yasmin. As a doctor, she has gone above and beyond everything, I ever would have expected. As a first-time parent, undergoing childbirth is a mix of immense pain followed by immense happiness and in this journey the blessing of having an amazing doctor is beyond words. 

I am literally grateful for her kindness whenever I see her.

I strongly recommend every aspiring pregnant woman to reach out to her (Dr. Sanjida Yasmin, MBBS, DGO, DNB, Senior Consultant, Gynaecologist & Obstetrician, Fellowship in Infertility) for her best guidance throughout your 9 months of pregnancy and even thereafter. ** *** ******* *********** ******* ****** ***** *** ** *** ******************* ************** ****** * ******** *********************** ***** ** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Labor and Delivery,
review:
As I am working in Delhi, I and my husband were so confused about whom (Doctor) should we go, as I was going first time "MOM TO BE". We found Dr. Sanjida Yasmin through Google while searching for Best Gynecologist. 

We got her appointment and met her. We followed her during the pregnancy. There were so many ups & downs in my pregnancy so I had contacted her in odd hours too without any hesitation and worry. And she listened my each and every problem politely and handled them gracefully as per the situations. She called me back whenever missed the call. This was my first pregnancy, so I felt nervous many times, She make me calm and provide me mental peace also by talking openly about everything. 

We wanted to have a normal delivery, but was not aware if that could be possible. Many times I asked her about that but Dr. Sanjida never gave me false hopes and make me understand that the only thing I need to do is stay motivated to have a normal delivery and follow her advices. She registered my name in antenatal exercises also. I followed exactly that and finally on 28.07.2023, I had a normal Vaginal delivery. Happy to share that i delivered a healthy baby boy. 

Thank you for everything you've listened and done for me. I felt very confident and secure in your care. I would like to extend my gratitude towards you for being the most dedicated, calm, carefull, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor. We thank her for all the support and care throughout 9 months and even now.

Thank you once again!!!

Dr. Sanjida Yasmin provided exceptional care during my visit. She was attentive, ************** and made me feel comfortable discussing my concerns. I highly recommend her for anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My recommendation for Dr sanjida Yasmin is 100%...

I m here to write my experience & honest review for Dr sanjida Yasmin  
I found her contact through Google while searching for **** Gynecologist for me I found her name and contact number   as I m expecting my second baby 
While contacting I got  her appointment 
I  met with Dr sanjida and  after that I had followed the Dr sanjida Yasmin treatment for 9 months . Ups & Downs comes in between I had contacted dr in odd hours too without any hesitation and worry & she had listen our problems politely  handled beautifully as per situations. On  04 March 2023 she assisted a normal Delievery for baby 
Now I m having a healthy baby Girl .

Thank you for everything you've done for me and I'm so happy I've found a doctor like you.I felt very confident and secure in your care.
I must say You are, by far, the kindest and nicest doctor i have ever met.
You are such a wonderful doctor as u always make me feel so safe. The compassion with which you treat me is more effective than any medicine! Thank you, doctor. You are a perfect combination of responsibility and care. 
Thanx Dr 
Makiya Naaz

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Sanjida Yasmin, the doctor that walks with you that extra mile which makes all the difference!
Words are not enough to thank Dr. Sanjida but if I tell you about her, she only reminds me of a Hippocratic oath in which a physician pledges to prescribe only beneficial treatments, according to his abilities and judgment. 
Two excerpts in particular, one from the classical Hippocratic oath and the other from contemporary version may give you an introduction of Dr. Sanjida, who I have experienced follows it in its true Spirit.
Following excerpt from Classical Hippocratic oath reads
“...I will follow that system of regimen which, according to my ability and judgment, I consider for the benefit of my patients, and abstain from whatever is deleterious and mischievous… With purity and with holiness I will pass my life and practice my Art..”
And this from the contemporary version of the Oath reads as
“...I will remember that there is art to medicine as well as science, and that warmth, sympathy, and understanding may outweigh the surgeon's knife or the chemist's drug.”
More power to Dr Sanjida!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Having visited multiple gynecologists before, I was disheartened by the previous experiences. One, in particular, prescribed costly multivitamins and tests like an ultrasound, which she didn’t perform adequately, claiming everything was normal despite persistent pain…. Opting for an external ultrasound revealed my problem So I decided to change In search of a solution for a vaginal infection, I decided to consult another doctor. This time was different. She listened patiently, comprehended my issue, and provided advice without judgment. Her friendly and calm demeanor during the consultation was a refreshing change. Understanding my problem, she prescribed only what was essential for my problem. I’m grateful for her approach and thankful for the positive experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Initially I was very spectical for my pregnancy as I had bicornuate uterus but the moment I met Dr. Sanjida, all my doubts were just gone away! She is such a wonderful person who stays with you throughout your journey!! She made sure to explain each and every aspect of this beautiful pregnancy journey! She was so kind enough to reach beyond her limits for her patients which I saw when she came specially for my delivery in other hospital. She will not only give you time but also she ll give all her ears to you, will understand each of your query and guide you the best! Her calm nature and positive attitude will always take you out of any hurdle. She is the best gynaecologist in Delhi NCR. She Highly recommended !!  I thank her from the bottom of my heart for guiding me and giving my beautiful daughter in my hands!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy,
review:
We were a little skeptical initially about getting treated by such a young Doctor, however, since the recommendation came from a good friend of ours so we took it on faith. During the course of entire pregnancy journey we developed Trust and friendship & today we feel blessed that we met Dr. Sanjida and how successfully she carried us to our 2nd Child Birth despite of the complications and one miscarriage in the past. Thank you so much Dr. Sanjida for all your support and guidance through out the process and being patient with us when we were impatient :-).

We would highly recommend Dr. Sanjida as a Great Gynaec we came to know accidentally among all our friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
******* *** *** *** ******* ** **** ******** ** *** ***** *** **** **** ***** *******  We started consulting her back in April 2021, and by December she finally got our Angel to this world. The best part about her is her calm nature, she ensures that she gives you the maximum time in order to ensure that you are left with no doubt regarding anything. She make sure to even share the small and minor details required.
She ensures that you get the best treatment as to what your pocket allows and don't get overcharged for anything.  

The best moment was when I called her at around 2:30 in the night when my wife's labour started, she came to the hospital at around 3:30 A.M and stayed till our Angel arrived. 

Her preference is always for a normal delivery and she ensures to prepare mother's mentally from the beginning. A highly recommended doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi, my experience with Dr. Sanjida is just awesome. Nothing more than an awesome word, my C- section was very satisfactory....i was smiling after my operation. I recomended Dr. Sanjida to all my relative & friends. Even she gave me online line help & support during covid. Always taking proactive actions . My pregancy was very smooth and she reduce each & every chance of complication.She knows everything about next step. I am lucky to have dr. Like her.....friends choose dr. Sanjida without any doubt...you will come to know in ur first visit that u made the right choice.

Thank you Dr. Sanjida...you are like an angle to me & my son.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ****** ** *** **** ****** ** **** **** **** We consulted her for delivery of our baby in Apr 2020 at 7 weeks. Right at the start we said we wanted a normal delivery and so she guided all the way and finally the baby was delivered normally in Jan 2021. There are numerous times she did out if the way things and supported us which at times made us believe that she is as good a human being as she is an expert doctor.she is compassionate, very understanding *** **** ************* ******. We highly recommend her for anyone who wants a normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Sanjida Yasmin is always like an elder sister. She always encourages people for normal delivery, economical hospitals and Covid free hospitals. 
I have many complications during pregnancy but were tackled very well by Dr Sanjida Yasmin.

After so many problems had CESAREAN delivery. I am thankful to Dr Sanjida Yasmin and Team- Apollo Cradle Hospital - Nehru Place.
I am extremely delighted to share that we had a healthy and beautiful baby boy.

Whenever there is any problem, I call or message them and she always responds to me.

At the start we had searched many hospitals and doctors to find the best gynecologist doctor. We also went to Forties and Rainbow hospital- Delhi. 
 
After consulting with her She was like Sister and friend because she took everything  from me and gave me  a lot of confidence that everything will be right. Thank you Dr Sanjida Yasmin and your team for helping me to bring my baby into this world.

"May ALMIGHTY bless you in this world and hereafter"

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,
review:
*** ******* ****** ** ** ********* ************ **** * **** **** I simply loved her politeness, affection, listening, critical care management, consultation and transparency with the patient. She simply explain each and every problem in a way that it simply relieve you even after knowing all the complications. She is a stress reliever at most critical time .

I started my journey with Dr. Sanjida in the month of October when I have conceived second time.I have faced so many complications in this pregnancy.After 3 months of pregnancy my double marker test report was positive.We were very disappointed and thought to drop but at this critical stage dr Sanjida Yasmin supported us and explained all the things very clearly.She is very caring well experienced and know to handle all the critical situation very well.She response all the calls and messages at any time.She also reminds all due appointment in advance. She is very polite and give time to the patient and responses all the queries very well manner.For the kind support of Dr Sanjida Yasmin I am blessed with a healthy baby girl ...Thanks a lot to Dr Sanjida Yasmin for her kind support and care of my journey.l always recommend Dr Sanjida Yasmin..
.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We donot have enough words to thank Dr Sanjida* *** ** **** *** **** ****** She has been an eternal support right from the beginning when we got to know about the conception to the time when we are holding our lil bundle of joy. Her simplicity and ease of working is what we like the best about her. Whether it was a silly question or a serious one she had the same calm face to answer them all. Every pregnancy is different and has its share of highs and lows but what matters is how you sail through it. Her support and explanations made it a smooth journey. She was available round the clock even at the busy hours of the day. She has such an amazing sense of responsibility that sometimes she would herself message and remind us of our scheduled appointments. That shows her dedication and concern towards her patients. I look forward to be in association with her in all the coming times. I am all thankful to her for the love she showers on us leaving behind her own personal life and doing everything selflessly and with a big vibrant smile!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr Sanjida for laparoscopic hysterectomy. I was suffering from multiple fibroid uterus and bleeding. Was searching for a good gynae . Luckily I met Dr Sanjida.She answered all my queries and made me feel safe. I trusted her and underwent laparoscopic hysterectomy. She took great care of me throughout. I feel blessed to have her as my doctor. My surgery was done very well and I have fully recovered now Thanks Dr for your support. I highly recommend Dr Sanjida to all patients.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Excellant treatment, guidance, on-time availability, remote support whenever needed, amicable as well as humble in nature etc so I strongly recommend Dr Sanjida Yasmin as she really help me in recent pregnancy case and the repercussions of her excellant treatment results in having a baby boy in sept 2021 with God Grace so thanks to almighty and thank you to Dr Sanjida for medical + moral support.

Regards, AB

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very satisfied with the manner in which she executed my delivery. It can't be better.  She knows her work. Everytime I needed her both pre and post delivery she was there and helped me with the best knowledge she have.  She is very passionate and give her best. Giving this feedback so that others will also get the kind of care and satisfaction I received. Strongly recommended Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother was suffering a lot due to gynae problems after consulting many senior doctors i got encountered with Dr Sanjida and we are very relaxed because she had answered our all queries and give the best solution without any further requirements or any confusion. Finally operation was good and my mother is fine and she is recovering. * **** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ****** ****** ****** ******* *** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I m very satisfied with  her all treatment during my entire pregnancy  ,delivery and post delivery. She guides in a very friendly manner and make her patients understand what needs to be done for our own betterment. I choose normal delivery over c section and she give her best to make it happen . For those who want proper and positive care during pregnancy and after pregnancy shall anyways consult dr sanjeeda . ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ star to her  anytime and always .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a great experience at Apollo Craddle from day one. Dr.Sanjida Yasmin is an experienced doctor available 24x7. She was very kind, polite and motivating through out our consultations and delivery.
Overall a great experience for second time parents. Best wishes to Dr. Sanjida

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
It has been a wonderful experience to get treated by her. She listen to her patient very calmly, support you throughout your treatment and even after that also. One of the best Gyne you can trust on.

In my case, another Dr of other clinic could not understood my problem and was treating me in wrong way. Dr sanjida yasmin Understood my problem quickly and changed the medicine from which i recovered fast. experience looks in her work. She will be my first recommendation among all  Gyne.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** *** **** ****** *** just treated you as its there job on the contrary she is kind, friendly, a very good listener always a text away very very happy to choose her as my gynaec. at the time of my labor she was there for me all the time and  keep on supporting me . even after delivery she is concerned with my health what more do any one want.

review: It's a big YES for Dr. Sanjida Yasmin. Me and my husband were so satisfied with the treatment n and whole journey with her. She was there at every point from starting to labour n supported in every way possible. Thankyou so much Doctor for your care and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sanjida has been my saviour when I was so stressed out about my pregnancy. She made sure the pregnancy was carried out smoothly by early intervention despite complications and the baby is delivered smoothly with utmost care and attention.. Any women who is stressed out.... Should visit Dr Sanjida

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: *** ******* ****** ** **** **** ****** * **** **** ***.Great experience as a first timer.Dr. Sanjida Yasmin combines expertise and a willingness to listen and discuss. She's also an excellent surgeon. She explained everything to me in a very clear manner. She was also kind and friendly.It's rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******* ****** ** *** **** **** * **** ************ Thank you for being the dedicated, thoughtful, and compassionate doctor that you are! You always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. I am a mother of one daughter and way you handled my delivery is just superb. In spite of so many complications you managed so well and give her out standing support all time. I feel so blessed to know you and have you as my doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We met her using practo application only and she was our first doctor till the time of delivery and we would totally recommend her. if she wasn't the doctor then we would have done the c section of delivery which she changed to normal despite of difficulties. she is a gem of a doctor 🙂. She is patient and humble. She is always available on phone and her guidance helped us to experience this journey in a special way. regards Taranpreet Singh and Tanoo kaur

tags: Doctor friendliness,

review:
*** ******* ****** ** * ***** ****** **** * *** ** ********** *** ********** 
We are extremely happy with her treatment,we delivered a healthy baby girl under her supervision. She is very polite and helpful. She is very humble and professional to the patient. 
 For this precious time it is very important to connect doctor at each an every minute. in case of any emergency you can call her anytime, I would highly recommend Dr. Sanjida Yasmin for normal and smooth pregnency journey.. Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had already visited two hospitals on 25th March (Lockdown) n I was in labor pain accompanied by absolute trauma n panic.  Then I happened to meet Dr Sanjida , she took me into confidence by sharing the right condition of my baby , she talked very well that made me feel the confidence that I n my baby will be  in safe hand. 
She was God sent angel to me .

review: We are extremely happy with her treatment, my wife delivered a healthy baby girl on 26th March 2020 under her supervision. She is polite and helpful. The best thing is that she is always reachable, in case of any emergency you can call her anytime, I highly recommend Dr. Sanjida Yasmin
